name: Henry Kaiser
description: '''Henry Kaiser''' (born September 19, 1952) is an American guitarist and composer, known as an idiosyncratic soloist, a sideman, an ethnomusicologist, and a film score composer. Recording and performing prolifically in many styles of music, Kaiser is a fixture on the [[San Francisco Bay Area]] music scene. He is considered a member of the "second generation" of American [[Free improvisation|free improvisers]]. He is married to Canadian artist Brandy Gale. He is the son of Henry J. Kaiser Jr. and the grandson of industrialist [[Henry J. Kaiser]].
